column5: Where is GCD? Inquiring minds want to know.
You can email him and ask him. He's staying on a southern US based crappie board.
he will come back more edumacated then ...feel sorry for the old fart cuz they dont have real fish in hog swaller ....( i still think his cousin Daisy is smokin hot)
Pretty sure he left a callin card for Lew a week ago that was found whilst out walkin the dawg
I miss him and his humor. When does he get out of the penalty box?
I think it is a penalty box of his own choosing... best to leave sleeping "dawgs" lay... so to speak.. I am sure it is not the last we have seen of him..  G
lol GCD was the reason I went from a lurker to a member! I miss the old coot!
kinda miss his crappie and catfish reports, maybe he'll come back one day
I think he drowned while noodling!
GCD if you come back I will fish without my shirt on.  In fact I bet all the gals here would!!!  Ya right....as if.....  But one never really knows
care to give a sample pic of what he might be missing if he doesnt come back...
